cont.entity_a: The product received did not match the description; the strap and the camera in the photo were not included.
The camera was in bad condition, missing a settings indicator and side cover. Some received cameras were in poor condition and missing items like the memory card.
The manual and editing software are available online for free and work with Windows 10.

Ease of Use.comm: The camera is easy to use.

cont.entity_a: The camera is suitable for beginners, with an automatic mode for ease of use.
cont.entity_b: The camera has a relatively easy-to-use interface.
Picture quality is good, especially for close-ups. The camera has vivid colors and excellent clarity. The camera takes sharp pictures even at low shutter speeds.
The camera is a good value for its price.

cont.entity_a: The camera is lightweight and versatile with a variety of settings.
Some received cameras were missing parts like the charger and had defects like a non-functioning sync to computer portal.
cont.entity_b: The camera lacks a CF card and the USB cable does not match the camera.

cont.entity_a: Some issues with the focus have been noted.
Some issues with the flash have been noted.
cont.entity_b: The camera has a proprietary hot shoe, limiting flash compatibility.

cont.entity_a: The camera was delivered ahead of schedule and matched the description.
The camera has a fast picture-taking speed.
The camera has excellent battery life.
cont.entity_b: The camera's battery life is exceptional.

cont.entity_a: The camera is durable and has been functional for many years.
cont.entity_b: The camera has been reliable over several years of use.

cont.entity_a: The customer service was responsive and helpful.

cont.entity_b: The camera is compatible with older Minolta lenses. The camera is praised for its compatibility with Minolta gear.
The anti-shake feature is effective. The image stabilization feature is highly effective.
The camera has many controls and is suitable for both beginners and advanced users.
